summary: Encapsulates the configuration needed to invoke Databricks embedding tasks, exposing the underlying settings, the list of OpenAI‑compatible parameters it supports, and a utility to translate those parameters into the format expected by the Databricks API.
business_intent: Allow downstream code to request text embeddings from Databricks foundation models without dealing with low‑level API details, by providing a ready‑made config object and automatic mapping from OpenAI‑style arguments to Databricks‑specific fields.
